mapper.select:
select * from flowchart
id like '%${id}%'
AND city like '%${city}%'
AND year like '%${year}%'
AND create_project_title like '%${create_project_title}%'
AND create_project_number like '%${create_project_number}%'

mapper.insert: insert into flowchart (id, city, year, create_project_title, create_project_number, project_name, mis_number, research_contract_number, simple_name, project_main_type, project_type, create_project_info, a_project_manager, project_leader, contract_pay_info, project_total_invest, ht_wireless, ht_transmission, ht_power, ht_civil, ht_total, a_time, a_note, b_time, b_note, c_time, c_note, d_time, d_note, e_time, e_note, f_time, f_note, check_info, final_cost_time, final_wireless, final_transmission, final_power, final_civil, final_total, fapiao_a_time, fapiao_a_scale, fapiao_a_money, fapiao_b_time, fapiao_b_scale, fapiao_b_money, fapiao_c_time, fapiao_c_scale, fapiao_c_money, remark) values (#{id}, #{city}, #{year}, #{create_project_title}, #{create_project_number}, #{project_name}, #{mis_number}, #{research_contract_number}, #{simple_name}, #{project_main_type}, #{project_type}, #{create_project_info}, #{a_project_manager}, #{project_leader}, #{contract_pay_info}, #{project_total_invest}, #{ht_wireless}, #{ht_transmission}, #{ht_power}, #{ht_civil}, #{ht_total}, #{a_time}, #{a_note}, #{b_time}, #{b_note}, #{c_time}, #{c_note}, #{d_time}, #{d_note}, #{e_time}, #{e_note}, #{f_time}, #{f_note}, #{check_info}, #{final_cost_time}, #{final_wireless}, #{final_transmission}, #{final_power}, #{final_civil}, #{final_total}, #{fapiao_a_time}, #{fapiao_a_scale}, #{fapiao_a_money}, #{fapiao_b_time}, #{fapiao_b_scale}, #{fapiao_b_money}, #{fapiao_c_time}, #{fapiao_c_scale}, #{fapiao_c_money}, #{remark})
